about_the_game:
In Nightwatch at the Hopkins' Cliffside, you are a member of the Committee for Handling Illogical Phenomena (CHIP), tasked with investigating and eliminating reality-defying anomalies at remote cliff. Your assignment: monitor the house surroundings for one night and neutralize any disturbances that arise. However, as the clock ticks, the anomalies become more frequent, more dangerous, and most importantly, some of them will hunt you down. Will you survive until dawn?

Features


  • Survive the Night: Face a variety of anomalies, from subtle spatial distortions to alternate realities seeping into your world. Each anomaly you encounter will challenge your perception and push your sanity to the brink.

  • Explore the Hopkins' house: Navigate through a beautifully crafted, historically rich environment filled with hidden lore, clues, and secrets that unravel the history of the estate and its former resident.

  • Master the Artifact: Wield a powerful Tetrahedron, an artifact capable of detecting and neutralizing reality-bending phenomena. Use it wisely, as it must cooldown after each use.

  • Immersive Atmosphere: Experience haunting atmosphere with dynamic sound design, chilling ambient music, and detailed visual effects that bring the estate’s unsettling presence to life.

  • Uncover Hidden Lore: Discover letters, and other artifacts that reveal the truth behind the anomalies and their origins.

The story


Over the past few years, anomalies have started to emerge around the world. Initially, they were noticed by only a few, but soon their intensity began to escalate. As governments could no longer deny their existence, investigations commenced. It quickly became clear that these alternate realities posed at least a global threat.

Scientists from around the world are now working together to create the first tools capable of stopping these aberrations. As a member of CHIP, your mission is not only to survive, but also to uncover crucial information about these anomalies.

Prepare yourself for a night of suspense, mystery, and psychological horror. The Hopkins' Cliffside is waiting, and it’s anything but ordinary.

name: Nightwatch at the Hopkins' Cliffside
short_description: Survive the night at Hopkins' Cliffside, a tense first-person horror game. Investigate anomalies, wield an ancient artifact, and uncover the secrets of the cliffside manor. Can you restore order before dawn, or will the madness consume you?
